taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Request CE Cascading Attribute Value Retrieve
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Returns the matched value of the "Property to Return" parameter for the given scope. If the Context is Submission, this handler will search for a matching submission value, if none found, it will search the form, then kapp, then space for a match.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. Should be one of Submission, Datastore Submission,Form,Datastore Form,Kapp,Space. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed.

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. Submission, Datastore Submission,Form,Datastore Form,Kapp,Space. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed.

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in. Not required for Datastore Form Start/Stop Context

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission or datastore submission to find values in
